content.user_title: Create aligned OKRs from company to team level
content.value_statement: This skill generates cascading OKRs that connect company strategy to team execution. It automates alignment scoring and creates dashboards showing how each level supports organizational goals. Strategic planning becomes faster and more transparent.
actual_capabilities: Generate company OKRs from 5 strategy templates (growth, retention, revenue, innovation, operational)
Cascade objectives down to product and team levels with contribution tracking
Calculate vertical and horizontal alignment scores across the organization
Create dashboard views showing the complete OKR hierarchy
limitations: Does not integrate with external systems like Jira or Asana
Does not track OKR progress over time
Does not import existing OKRs from files or APIs

use_cases.title: Quarterly strategic planning
use_cases.description: Generate aligned OKRs for the upcoming quarter connecting company goals to team execution.

use_cases.title: Team alignment workshop
use_cases.description: Create team-level OKRs that cascade from product objectives and demonstrate clear contribution.

use_cases.title: Leadership strategy review
use_cases.description: View the complete OKR hierarchy with alignment scores to assess organizational focus.

prompt_templates.title: Quick OKR generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the product-strategist skill to generate growth-focused OKRs that cascade from company to team level

prompt_templates.title: Revenue-focused OKRs
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate revenue strategy OKRs using the product-strategist skill with current metrics of 10M ARR and target of 15M

prompt_templates.title: Retention analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Create retention-focused OKRs that cascade from company objectives through product to all teams

prompt_templates.title: Alignment assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the product-strategist skill to calculate alignment scores and show how well teams are connected to company objectives

output: Company Objectives (Q1 2025): Accelerate user acquisition and market expansion, Achieve product-market fit in new segments, Build sustainable growth engine
Product Level: Build viral product features, Validate product hypotheses, Create product-led growth loops
Team Level: Growth Team focuses on acquisition, Platform Team on reliability, Mobile Team on app experience, Data Team on analytics
Alignment Scores: Vertical 100%, Horizontal 75%, Coverage 100%, Overall 87%
Revenue Objectives: Drive sustainable revenue growth, Optimize monetization strategy, Expand revenue per customer
Product Translation: Optimize product monetization, Improve pricing strategy, Launch premium features
Team Contributions: Growth Team drives user upgrades, Platform Team ensures reliable payments, Mobile Team optimizes in-app purchases

best_practices: Start with clear company-level objectives before cascading to product and team levels
Review alignment scores to identify gaps where objectives are not fully covered
Use the appropriate strategy template (growth, retention, revenue, innovation, operational) for your business phase
anti_patterns: Creating OKRs at all levels without checking alignment scores
Using generic objectives instead of strategy-specific templates
Failing to distribute key results proportionally across teams

faq.question: What strategy templates are available?
faq.answer: Five templates: growth for acquisition, retention for loyalty, revenue for monetization, innovation for new capabilities, operational for efficiency.

faq.question: How does alignment scoring work?
faq.answer: Vertical alignment measures how well lower levels support upper levels. Horizontal alignment measures team coordination. Coverage measures objective coverage.

faq.question: Can I customize the output?
faq.answer: Pass metrics like current and target values. Add json as a second argument for machine-readable output.

faq.question: How many objectives are generated?
faq.answer: Three objectives per level, each with three to five key results. This can be adjusted in the script.

faq.question: What teams are included by default?
faq.answer: Four teams: Growth, Platform, Mobile, and Data. Each receives relevant objectives based on keyword matching.

faq.question: How do I export OKRs for Jira?
faq.answer: Run with the json argument to get machine-readable output that can be imported into project management tools.
